name: @modelcontextprotocol/specification
description: Model Context Protocol specification and protocol schema
author: Anthropic, PBC (https://anthropic.com)

scripts.check: npm run check:schema && npm run check:docs
scripts.check:schema: npm run check:schema:ts && npm run check:schema:json && npm run check:schema:json:2020-12 && npm run check:schema:md
scripts.check:schema:json: for f in schema/2024-11-05/schema.ts schema/2025-03-26/schema.ts schema/2025-06-18/schema.ts; do typescript-json-schema --defaultNumberType integer --required --skipLibCheck "$f" "*" | cmp "${f%.ts}.json" - || exit 1; done
scripts.check:schema:json:2020-12: npm run generate:schema:json:2020-12 && git diff --exit-code schema/draft/schema.json || (echo 'Error: schema/draft/schema.json is out of date. Run: npm run generate:schema:json:2020-12' && exit 1)
scripts.check:schema:md: for f in schema/*/schema.mdx; do typedoc --entryPoints "${f%.mdx}.ts" --schemaPageTemplate "$f" | cmp docs/specification/$(basename -- $(dirname -- "$f"))/schema.mdx - || exit 1; done
scripts.check:docs: npm run check:docs:format && npm run check:docs:links
scripts.generate:schema: npm run generate:schema:json && npm run generate:schema:md
scripts.generate:schema:json: npm run generate:schema:json:2020-12 && for f in schema/2024-11-05/schema.ts schema/2025-03-26/schema.ts schema/2025-06-18/schema.ts; do typescript-json-schema --defaultNumberType integer --required --skipLibCheck "$f" "*" -o "${f%.ts}.json"; done
scripts.generate:schema:json:2020-12: typescript-json-schema --defaultNumberType integer --required --skipLibCheck schema/draft/schema.ts "*" -o schema/draft/schema.json && sed -i "s@http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#@https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema@g; s@\"definitions\":@\"\$defs\":@g; s@#/definitions/@#/\$defs/@g" schema/draft/schema.json
scripts.generate:schema:md: for f in schema/*/schema.mdx; do typedoc --entryPoints "${f%.mdx}.ts" --schemaPageTemplate "$f" > docs/specification/$(basename -- $(dirname -- "$f"))/schema.mdx; done
